'''Shanyrria Alenuath''' was a [[bladesinger]] of the [[Alenuath]] clan in [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: A talented bladesinger, Shanyrria was often in [[Faer√ªn]] to help scattered groups of elves or to fight enemies like the [[Church of Cyric]] or [[Zhentil Keep]]. Often, she was in [[Evereska]].
document_data.Personality: Shanyrria was outgoing and vivacious and enjoyed outdoor activities like fishing, hunting, or swimming. She liked being alone among the trees.
document_data.Rumors: Some said Shanyrria had [[human]] blood but she always denied it.
document_data.Relationship: Shanyrria was friends with a [[centaur]] tribe.
